column6: SERIES FINALE! A PERFECT STORM concludes with a battle royal in the heart of Wakanda...and all bets are off! Will your favorite X-Man make it out of the rubble alive? Only X-legend Chris Claremont knows!! It's the mutant super-team vs. Earth's Mightiest Heroes!!
column8: | writer:Chris Claremont | penciller (cover):Tom Grummett | penciller:Ramon Rosanas | penciller:Andy Smith | editor:Jordan White
